General.Name: Indo Acidatama Tbk
General.Description: PT Indo Acidatama Tbk produces and sells basic and agro chemicals primarily in Indonesia. The company offers ethanol, acetic acid, and ethyl acetate products; and organic plus bio fertilizers for agriculture, livestock, and fishery under the POMI, RANDEX, ALFINASE, and BEKA names. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Sarasa Nugraha Tbk and changed its name to PT Indo Acidatama Tbk in May 2006. PT Indo Acidatama Tbk was founded in 1982 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

1.Name: Mr. Sharad Ganesh Ugrankar
1.Title: Fin. & Admin. Director and Independent Director
